name: Emergency_Contact
description:
Welcome to the Center. As an emergency services dispatcher, you must locate and assist your callers. They will be in critical situations, and you must provide them advice and guidance through their situations. Remember, your primary objective is to locate your caller, and keep them on the call until emergency services can get to them.

- Good luck Mrs. Doe.

This is the first game prototype for BranCo. Games. The game is designed for mobile apps, so it will be minimalistic on a full pc. We here at BranCo. Games always welcome criticism and advise, and general feedback is recommended. Any feedback is useful. Enjoy!

-Mrs. Branco, Founder of BranCo. Games
